required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Brainstem Mapping of Nociceptive Trigeminal Input

brief_summary.textblock: To what extent the somatotopy of the 3 branches of the trigeminal nerve (V1,V2,V3) as well as the greater occipital nerve (GON) in the brainstem but also in the thalamus and the insula can be mapped using functional imaging and BOLD in humans is not known but might play an important role in imaging headache diseases. The aim is to map their somatotopy by random stimulation of V1, V2, V3 and the GON with painful electrical input during acquisition of BOLD-fMRI.

primary_outcome.measure: Statistical Parametric Map calculated from the fMRI data on brainstem level
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 9 months
primary_outcome.description: At a statistical threshold of T-value 3 we will observe a somatotopical arrangement in the brainstem below the pons: Expected location for V1: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (-1,-48,-75); Expected location for V2: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (-4,-47,-69) Expected location for V3: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (-1,-46,-66) Expected location for GON: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (-1,-45,-64)

primary_outcome.measure: Statistical Parametric Map calculated from the fMRI data in the thalamus
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 9 months
primary_outcome.description: At a statistical threshold of T-value 4 we will observe a somatotopical arrangement in the thalamus: Expected location for V1: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (11,-5,6); Expected location for V2: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (13,-11,5) Expected location for V3: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (12,-10,5) Expected location for GON: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (15,-12,-7)

primary_outcome.measure: Statistical Parametric Map calculated from the fMRI data in the insula
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 9 months
primary_outcome.description: At a statistical threshold of T-value 4 we will observe a somatotopical arrangement in the insula: Expected location for V1: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (38,-15,8); Expected location for V2: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (37,-8,-5) Expected location for V3: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (39,2,-11) Expected location for GON: within radius of 10 mm around the MNI coordinates (38,-12,-3)

secondary_outcome.measure: Statistical Parametric Map calculated from the fMRI data in the cerebellum
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 9 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Statistical Parametric Map calculated from the fMRI data in the periaqueductal gray (PAG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 9 months

intervention.description: Electric stimulation with a Digitimer DS7AH HV Current Stimulator delivered with 4 shielded electrodes mounted on the participants head

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy
- suitable fo MRI
Exclusion Criteria:
- headache disease
- psychological disorder
- pregnancy
- all exclusion criteria necessary for imaging in a 3 T MRI scanner

patient_data.ipd_description: Group results will be presented at international conferences as well as published in international peer-reviewed journals
